name: AudioSessionOperationRestriction
description: The operational permission of the SDK on the audio session.

parameters.None: No restriction, the SDK has full control of the audio session operations.

parameters.SetCategory: The SDK does not change the audio session category.

parameters.ConfigureSession: The SDK does not change any setting of the audio session (category, mode, categoryOptions).

parameters.DeactivateSession: The SDK keeps the audio session active when leaving a channel.

parameters.All: The SDK does not configure the audio session anymore.
